flawed_nl_solution:
He increased his speed by 150*0.3=54 mph
So his new speed was 150+54=<<150+54=204>>204 mph
He increased it a further 10 mph so his new speed is 204+10=<<204+10=214>>214 mph
#### 214

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
